name: decidim-bulletin_board-ruby
description: Welcome to your new gem! In this directory, you'll find the files you need to be able to package up your Ruby library into a gem. Put your Ruby code in the file `lib/decidim/bulletin_board`. To experiment with that code, run `bin/console` for an interactive prompt.

scripts.prerelease: cd ../decidim-bulletin_board-app && npm run release && git add . && git commit --amend
